resources.string: For easiest use, try 4, 6 oder 8 icons.
Pinch/zoom to scale the pie menu.
Drag icons to order pie menu.

Please disable battery optimizations for Pie Launcher to save energy and make it work faster.

Pie Launcher does not consume battery when not in use. A home screen launcher is an exception because it should always and immediately be available, which is prevented by battery optimizations.

For this reason, the default launcher is already excluded from battery optimizations too.
